pageNotFound: 404 Error - Halaman yang Anda cari tidak ditemukan

homepage.discoverVimsu: Temukan pengalaman konferensi virtual 2.5D bersama kami!

accountSettings.changeSuccess: Perubahan yang Anda buat sudah disimpan
accountSettings.usernameTaken: Nama pengguna yang Anda masukan sudah terdaftar. Silahkan coba lagi.
accountSettings.emailTaken: Email yang Anda masukan sudah terdaftar. Silahkan coba lagi.
accountSettings.changeError: Terjadi kesalahan saat menyimpan perubahan Anda. Silahkan coba lagi.
accountSettings.invalidUsername: Nama pengguna yang Anda masukan tidak sesuai dengan kriteria kami. Silahkan coba lagi.
accountSettings.invalidEmail: Email yang Anda masukan tidak valid. Silahkan coba lagi.
accountSettings.invalidTitle: Titel tidak valid. Silahkan pilih titel dari opsi yang kami berikan.
accountSettings.deleteAccountFail: Terjadi kesalahan saat menghapus akun Anda. Silahkan coba lagi.
accountSettings.oldPasswordWrong: Kata sandi lama Anda tidak sesuai. Silahkan coba lagi.
accountSettings.passwordsDontMatch: Kata sandi baru yang Anda masukan tidak sesuai. Silahkan coba lagi.
accountSettings.changePasswordFail: Terjadi kesalahan saat mengubah kata sandi Anda. Silahkan coba lagi.

logIn.wrongFields: Nama pengguna/email dan kata sandi yang Anda masukan tidak sesuai. Silahkan coba lagi.

contactUs.reachUsAt: Anda dapat menghubungi kami melalui email
contactUs.stayAnonymous: Untuk mengirim pesan secara anonim, tinggalkan pesan dengan mengisi form di bawah ini :)
contactUs.messageSent: Kami telah menerima pesan Anda, terima kasih!
contactUs.messageSentFail: Terjadi kesalahan saat mengirim pesan Anda. Silahkan coba lagi.

forgotPassword.linkSent: Kami telah mengirim link ke your_email untuk mengubah kata sandi Anda.

verification.fail: Verifikasi tidak berhasil! Silahkan coba lagi.

register.success: Kami telah mengirim link verifikasi ke your_email. Silahkan klik link tersebut untuk menyelesaikan proses registrasi.
register.passwordsDontMatch: Kata sandi tidak sesuai. Silahkan coba lagi.
register.fail: Terjadi kesalahan saat mendaftarkan akun Anda. Silahkan coba lagi.

upload.success: Slot seminar sudah dibuat. Anda berhak meninggalkan halaman ini.
upload.noFiles: Belum ada file yang diunggah. Silahkan unggah video.
upload.tooLarge: Ukuran file melebihi 50 MB. Silahkan coba lagi.
upload.wrongFileType: Tipe file tidak didukung. Silahkan coba lagi.
upload.wrongTypeMaxPpants: Jumlah maksimal peserta harus berupa bilangan bulat.
upload.invalidDate: Waktu mulai harus berupa tanggal yang valid.
upload.errorUpload: Terjadi kesalahan saat mengunggah video. Silahkan coba lagi.
upload.errorCreateSlot: Terjadi kesalahan saat membuat slot seminar. Silahkan coba lagi.
upload.supportedFiles: File yang didukung: .mp4 || Ukuran maks. : 50 MB

hud.confirmLeave: Are you sure you want to leave the conference?

tooltips.friendlist: Friend list and received friend request list

allchat.quietChat: The <roomName> chat is somehow quiet. Send some love here?

notifBar.newGroupChat: usernamePlaceholder invited you to the group chat groupNamePlaceholder.
notifBar.newMeeting: You were invited to the video meeting meetingNamePlaceholder.
notifBar.inCall: You are in call with meetingNamePlaceholder.

ranklist.noParticipants: There are no participants in this conference yet.

tooltips.chatNow: Close business card and chat now

chats.noChats: No chats found. Let's connect with others!
chats.confirmLeaveChat: Are you sure you want to leave from chat chat_name?
chats.tooManyFriends: You may only invite limit friend(s)! Please unselect diff friend(s).
chats.selectAtLeastOne: Please select at least one friend!

tooltips.sendCode: Sends the code you entered in the input field

currentLectures.noLectures: Lectures will be shown here 10 minutes before the start. Please check the schedule and come back later.

lecture.questionsAfterLecture: You can ask questions in this chat after the lecture.
lecture.chatAfterLecture: This chat will be opened after the lecture.
lecture.moderatorRights: You have the right to close the lecture or to ban participants after the lecture.
lecture.notOverWithToken: The lecture is not over! When you leave, you have 5 minutes to come back. After that time, your token will expire for this lecture. Are you sure you want to leave?
lecture.notOverOrator: The lecture is not over! When you leave, make sure to come back before the lecture is over. The participants will be waiting for you to answer their questions. Are you sure you want to leave?
lecture.notOverWithoutToken: The lecture is not over! Are you sure you want to leave?
lecture.comeBackOnTime: When you leave, you have 5 minutes after the lecture begins to come back. After that time, your token will expire for this lecture. Please come back on time!

tokenMessages.revoke: Your token was revoked by either the orator or a moderator. Therefore, you are no longer able to ask questions in the lecture chat. Please remember to follow chat etiquette.
tokenMessages.timeout: You left the lecture for too long. Therefore, you will not be able to ask questions in the lecture chat.

friendList.sureToRemove: Are you sure you want to remove usernamePlaceholder from your friend list?
friendList.noFriends: No friends were found. Chat with others and send some friend requests!

tooltips.chatNow: Close friend list and chat now
tooltips.acceptRequest: Remove from friend request and add to friend list
tooltips.rejectRequest: Remove from friend request and reject

tooltips.minimizeMeeting: Minimize meeting, voice chat will stay active

newAchievement.unlockedWithDescription: You have unlocked a new achievement: descriptionPlaceholder
